I was under for 3.5 hours and I woke up feeling great. Make sure your issues are addressed before your surgery. Last month I had an elective surgery on a hammer toe with conscience sedation and left with nausea and virtigo for hours. Communicate your worries. They can be addressed. The warm blanket is a comfort.
